availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Michael Fahey (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Ireland native. Married to Bridget Keeley. Father of Bridget Fahey, Honor Fahey, Michael Fahey, Pat Fahey, and Catherine "Kate" Fahey. Farm laborer in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 02, p. 457.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 11, p. 417B.
